title: Personal goals of health/fitness club members 2014
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Percentage of respondents for 13 number of Reasons to Reasons for joinings.
The Percentage of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Reasons to Reasons for joining To stay healthy and lowest at Reasons to Reasons for joining To gain weight.
There is a difference of 61.0 between the maximum Reasons to Reasons for joining To stay healthy and minimum Reasons to Reasons for joining To gain weight.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Reasons to Reasons for joining in the x axis and Percentage of respondents in the y axis.
Reasons to Reasons for joining To stay healthy has the highest Percentage of respondents and To gain weight has the lowest Percentage of respondents.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Percentage of respondents for 13 number of Reasons to Reasons for joinings.
The Percentage of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Reasons to Reasons for joining To stay healthy and lowest at Reasons to Reasons for joining To gain weight.
There is a difference of 61.0 between the maximum Reasons to Reasons for joining To stay healthy and minimum Reasons to Reasons for joining To gain weight.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Percentage of respondents for 13 number of Reasons to Reasons for joinings.
The maximum Percentage of respondents 64.0 is found at Reasons to Reasons for joining To stay healthy and the minimum is found at To gain weight where Reasons to Reasons for joining is 3.0.
Second maximum Percentage of respondents is found at Reasons to Reasons for joining To feel better about myself.
The difference of Percentage of respondents between the highest and lowest Reasons to Reasons for joining is 61.0.
Percentage of respondents at Reasons to Reasons for joining To stay healthy is 64.0 , second place is To feel better about myself at 52.0, and thirdly is To stay in shape at 46.0.
Reasons to Reasons for joining To look better, and To lose weight have a similar Percentage of respondents that is 45.0.
The Reasons to Reasons for joining To gain weight tends to be 1.78 percent lower than average.
The Percentage of respondents is 468.0 if we add up values of all Reasons to Reasons for joinings.
